comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Commander Quevedo was representing Cuba at the dedication of the Maine Monument. He commanded the vessel "Cuba"

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Cynthia Wenslow:  Thank you for the additional information on Comm. Quevedo!  We've also learned more about Adm. Badger, so the descriptive information can be expanded when we update our source record.
